segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of the water spilling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is too focused on drying the dishes to notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so peaceful compared to the indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of urgency, hoping the woman will turn around and notice the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, and that worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get in trouble for taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is a hazard, and I hope no one slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman's focus on the dishes is both impressive and concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR
